Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier signal problems at Rosemont. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier signal problems at Rosemont. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
